css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u{justify-content:flex-start;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);min-width:initial;}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box{min-width:initial;width:auto;padding-bottom:15px;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box .maxi-number-counter__box__circle{stroke:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),1);}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box .maxi-number-counter__box__background{stroke:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-2,5,23,33),1);}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box .maxi-number-counter__box__text{font-size:47px;font-family:Roboto;font-weight:700;color:rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-4,255,74,23),1);}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box .maxi-number-counter__box__text tspan{font-size:45.333333333333336px;}@media only screen and (min-width:1921px){body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box{padding-bottom:22px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u .maxi-number-counter__box .maxi-number-counter__box__text{font-size:68px;}}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #number-counter-maxi-ce4732bc-u{justify-content:center;}}
